name: BreadRunner
description: BreadRunner - Hack the Net, Spread the Bread was created for the Global Game Jam 2018. The game takes place in the year 2099. You play as a Runner and your job is to expose corporate secretes to the world, like the fact that Canada's largest grocery chain has fixed the price of bread *again!* Actually, the game is based on the recent price fixing Loblaws secretly undertook between 2001-2015, colluding with suppliers to inflate the price of bread.
